FullDescription: Detect Sooner, Troubleshoot Faster. ControlRooms is the AI Troubleshooting company. Our SaaS application is the first AI-assisted troubleshooting platform for heavy industry. With ControlRooms, operators and engineers can improve troubleshooting and see around corners. ControlRooms uses advanced AI to shine a light on the trends that matter and identify anomalies across plant systems. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Austin, Texas.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, Nuclear, Software
FullDescription: Nuclearn is a software company delivering AI solutions for automating Nuclear Industry tasks. Nuclearn was established in 2020 by two esteemed veterans from the nuclear industry, Jerrold Vincent and Bradley Fox, driven by their passion for innovation. With backgrounds in nuclear engineering, business intelligence, and process improvement, the co-founders came together to create the industry's pioneering in-house data science team at the Palo Verde Nuclear Generating Station in 2016. Their remarkable work quickly gained recognition throughout the nuclear sector, resulting in a US-issued patent and the prestigious NEI Best of the Best, Top Innovative Practice Award in 2020. Fueled by this innovative spirit and a mission to benefit the entire nuclear power industry, Nuclearn was born to provide a safe and efficient way to automate critical processes in the field.

FullDescription: Metroscope is a new technology for diagnosing and maintaining electrical utilities, combining Digital Twins and Artificial Intelligence (AI). The company Metroscope was founded by the inventors of the patented technology and is a subsidiary of the EDF Group. Around the world, the software is already installed on more than 50 GW. In North America and Europe, this amounts to over 50 assets, including nuclear plants, thermal assets, and cooling systems for data centers.

FullDescription: ANTLER Technologies & Start-Up Studio Corp. (ANTLER) is a Toronto/Markham-based high-tech company that focuses on elevating marginalized operations in small, medium and enterprise industries. ANTLER deploys mission-critical operation processes into a cyber-physical space to hyper automate redundancies, exposing misalignment in operations, regulation non-compliance, inefficient workflow processes, time spent on low-value work and gaps in green initiatives. ANTLER's platforms provide a solution that will elevate the customer's strategy in becoming Net-Zero, Customer Experience (CX) driven and operationally hyper-efficient across their operation's value chain.
